service.name: migrateStatusToGlReconciliation
service.description: Migrate statusId to GlReconciliation entity, this service can be used to upgrade existing data i.e it sets the statusId(new field in entity) to "Created" if reconciledBalance found empty otherwise sets "Reconciled". Before running this service, load the seed data for StatusType and StatusItem from the file : accounting/data/AccountingTypeData.xml

service.name: migrateStatusToFinAccountTrans
service.description: Migrate statusId to FinAccountTrans entity, this service can be used to upgrade existing data i.e it sets the statusId(new field in entity) to "Approved" if found empty. Before running this service, load the seed data for StatusType and StatusItem from the file : accounting/data/AccountingTypeData.xml

service.name: migrateFixedAssetMaintMeter
service.description: Copy the FixedAssetMaintMeter entity to FixedAssetMeter. FixedAssetMeter.readingDate will be replaced with FixedAssetMaintMeter.createdStamp.

service.name: migrateAgreementWorkEffortAppl
service.description: Copy the AgreementWorkEffortAppl entity to AgreementWorkEffortApplic
